verses.verse: "Come,<WH3212> and let us return<WH7725> to Yahweh;<WH3068> for he has torn<WH2963> us to pieces,<WH7495> and he will heal us;<WH5221> he has injured us,<WH2280> and he will bind up our wounds.
After two days<WH3117> he will revive<WH2421> us.<WH7992> On the third day<WH3117> he will raise us up,<WH6965> and we will live<WH2421> before him.<WH6440>

Let us acknowledge<WH3045> Yahweh.<WH7291> Let us press on to know<WH3045> Yahweh.<WH3068> As surely<WH3559> as the sun rises,<WH7837> Yahweh<WH3068> will appear.<WH935> He will come to us like the rain,<WH3384> like the spring<WH4456> rain<WH3384> that waters the earth.<WH776>"

"Ephraim,<WH669> what shall I do<WH6213> to you?<WH3063> Judah, what shall I do<WH6213> to you?<WH2617> For your love is like a morning<WH1242> cloud,<WH6051> and like the dew<WH2919> that disappears<WH1980> early.<WH7925>

Therefore I have cut<WH2672> them to pieces with the prophets;<WH5030> I killed<WH2026> them with the words<WH561> of my mouth.<WH6310> Your judgments<WH4941> are like a flash<WH216> of lightning.<WH216>
For I desire<WH2654> mercy,<WH2617> and not sacrifice;<WH2077> and the knowledge<WH1847> of God<WH430> more than burnt offerings.<WH5930>
But they,<WH120> like Adam, have broken<WH5674> the covenant.<WH1285> They were unfaithful to me,<WH898> there.
Gilead<WH1568> is a city<WH7151> of those who work<WH6466> iniquity;<WH205> it is stained<WH6121> with blood.<WH1818>

As gangs of robbers wait<WH2442> to ambush<WH2442> a man,<WH376> so the company<WH2267> of priests<WH3548> murder<WH7523> in the way<WH1870> toward Shechem,<WH7926> committing<WH6213> shameful crimes.<WH2154>
In the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> I have seen<WH7200> a horrible thing.<WH8186> There is prostitution<WH2184> in Ephraim.<WH669> Israel<WH3478> is defiled.<WH2930>
"Also,<WH3063> Judah, there is a harvest<WH7105> appointed<WH7896> for you,<WH7725> when I restore the fortunes<WH7622> of my people.<WH5971>
